text:
Champions League
PSG - Brugge: which team for Tuchel?
The Paris Saint-Germain returns to the European Cup, with a match allowing him to validate his ticket for the knockout stages.
06 Nov 2019, 10:00 by Thomas Rassouli



It only takes a small point for Thomas Tuchel's men to definitively validate the qualification for the next stage of the competition in the Champions League. Only against Brugge, it is a bruised PSG and in need of catching up who presents himself, after a rout in Dijon Friday night. An incomprehensible failure for the Parisians, revenge.




The Brazilian may have returned to training yesterday, it is still too early to see him on the field. PSG should come up with an eleven-type for Tuchel. A Thiago Silva-Kimpembe hinge, Marquinhos as a sentinel behind Verratti and Gueye, and Icardi preferred to Cavani at the forefront of the attack, as is the current trend. The duo Di Maria-Mbapp√© is highly anticipated.
Without Neymar




The probable composition of PSG +18 üì∑Credit Photo - Demivol√©e

The Brazilian may have returned to training yesterday, it is still too early to see him on the field. PSG should come up with an eleven-type for Tuchel.
